Settings.Full: Converts the 'Mech to use Quicsell Double Heat Sinks
Double Autocannons always fire two shots and hit or miss with both
Persistent ECM Jams Everyone within {0} Meters by {1}.
Thermal Mass absorbs heat when you hit the redline, but it equalizes over the next three rounds.
You receive a stacking {0} penalty to heatsinking while the thermal mass is equalizing.
Quicsell Ammo deals 10% lower average damage, but has a variance of +/-40%. It also contains 10% more ammunition, rounded up.
Quicsell Heavy Chem Lasers deal considerably more damage, but use up two ammo per shot.
Quicsell CASE II reduces internal explosion damage to only 15 points. Can be destroyed.
Penalty of {0} to sensor detection: receive less info about detected targets.
Quicsell Machineguns always fire 6 shots. They have high recoil and jam chance, but come with ammo.
This weapon does only {0} damage at point blank range, but full damage at its maximum range.
This weapon deals full damage at point blank range, but falls off to {0} damage at its maximum range.
QS OmniMechs allow rapid refitting, but have permanently affixed internals.
